commit.message:
trans-mem.c (ipa_tm_create_version): Set externally_visible.

        * trans-mem.c (ipa_tm_create_version): Set externally_visible.
        (ipa_tm_create_version_alias): Same.

From-SVN: r183444

files.patch:
